formatOptions.My comments-snippetInterface: Specifies the format of Step definitions generated if not present

default.My comments-paths: Specifies the file paths for the feature files
default.My comments-require: Specifies the file paths for the .step and .page files
default.My comments-format: Specifies the format of the output report
default.My comments-publishQuiet: Suppresses verbose output during test execution
default.My comments-dryRun: Checks the features have valid step definitions without executing them
default.My comments-requireModule: This is a specific option within the cucumber.json file that instructs Cucumber to use ts-node to register your TypeScript step definitions and hooks before running your tests
default.My comments-strict: Treats undefined and pending steps as error

My comments-rerun: Config for re running the failed Scenarios
